6.title: AROUND THE WORLD
clues: Oskar Schindler is buried on Mount Zion in this city

This capital's Plaza Independencia has a statue of Jose Artigas, hero of Uruguayan independencia

clues: 1984:To this "physician", for his books of playful rhymes, nonsense words & strange illustrations
